column4: I still have a problem about shifting to ubuntu with regards to industry strength softwares... For example, We're using dreamweaver, flash, and photoshop at school. I there any way I can run this programs in ubuntu?
I've noticed that photoshop cs2 is working well in ubuntu but flash and dreamweaver are not...

no but those are mostly dumbed down apps. inkscape can do what flash does and i have flash installed in wine but i rarely use it anymore, gimp can do what photoshop does and i have fireworks installed in wine too
yeh its one of the open source coding apps
